plot: After the World War I, a french ace and his commanding officer found an airline company in China, meanwhile the country is torn by political and criminal rivalries.
title: Les ailes du dragon
plot_es: After the World War I, a french ace and his commanding officer found an airline company in China, meanwhile the country is torn by political and criminal rivalries.
plot_en: After the World War I, a french ace and his commanding officer found an airline company in China, meanwhile the country is torn by political and criminal rivalries.
